basic.description:
{Basic Scholar}

Allows heroes to teach each other { 1st & 2nd level } spells and increases knowledge by {1}

advanced.description:
{Advanced Scholar}

Allows heroes to teach each other any spell up to {3rd level} and increases knowledge by {2}

expert.description:
{Expert Scholar}

Allows heroes to teach each other any spell up to {4th level} and increases knowledge by {3}
